name: SPLIT (itch) (PokeNinjaGuy)
description:
Click "Enter>" to start.

Controls: 

Movement: A & D or left and right arrows

Jump: W or Z

Enter door: S or Down arrow

Alternate between 1 and 2 slimes: Space bar or Left mouse button

Alternate between 2 slimes (if in 2 slime mode): X or Right mouse button

All art, music, sfx, and code made in the span of the week, by me.
